archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0671
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a business customer I want to be able to determine a specific dollar amount that will charge to account and pooled device subsidy

properties.value: To be discussed, "pooled device subsidy" Prepaid amount of money they can spend on hardware (on any device that is available for the customer). Negotiated as part of the agreement.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
